button.name: 4Comm2VolumeUp
button.code: send {Shift Down}{Ctrl Down}{Alt Down}{NumpadAdd}{Alt Up}{Ctrl Up}{Shift Up}

button.name: 4Comm2VolumeDown
button.code: send {Shift Down}{Ctrl Down}{Alt Down}{NumpadSub}{Alt Up}{Ctrl Up}{Shift Up}

button.name: 16InstrumentLightCW
button.code: send {Shift Down}{Ctrl Down}{Alt Down}{7}{Alt Up}{Ctrl Up}{Shift Up}

button.name: 16InstrumentLightCCW
button.code: send {Shift Down}{Ctrl Down}{Alt Down}{8}{Alt Up}{Ctrl Up}{Shift Up}

button.name: 15InteriorLightCCW
button.code: send {Shift Down}{Ctrl Down}{Alt Down}{6}{Alt Up}{Ctrl Up}{Shift Up}

button.name: 14InteriorLightCW
button.code: send {Shift Down}{Ctrl Down}{Alt Down}{5}{Alt Up}{Ctrl Up}{Shift Up}
